title: Spanish Household Vocabulary
description: Common household items in Spanish with English translation options.

questions.question: plato
questions.meaning: A flat dish used for serving or eating food.

questions.question: losa
questions.meaning: A thin flat piece of stone or ceramic for covering floors or walls.

questions.question: mesa
questions.meaning: A piece of furniture with a flat top supported by legs.

questions.question: servicio
questions.meaning: A room containing a toilet and usually a sink.

questions.question: cubierto
questions.meaning: Utensils like forks, knives, and spoons used for eating.

questions.question: vaso
questions.meaning: A container, typically made of glass, used for drinking liquids.

questions.question: silla
questions.meaning: A seat for one person that has a back and often four legs.

questions.question: cuchara
questions.meaning: A utensil with a shallow bowl used for eating or serving.

questions.question: cuchillo
questions.meaning: A sharp-edged utensil used for cutting.

questions.question: tenedor
questions.meaning: A utensil with prongs used to spear and lift food.

questions.question: taza
questions.meaning: A small container with a handle used for drinking hot liquids.

questions.question: servilleta
questions.meaning: A piece of cloth or paper used to wipe the mouth and hands while eating.
